content: FHIR-I will host a SMART on FHIR Block Vote during the Monday 7/19 3-5 PM ET call! Please reply here or to the email list if you prefer to have a comment discussed.

@Brett Marquard In today's bulk dat discussion one of the SmartOnFhir tickets came up: FHIR-32251. In the call, we decided that it would be good to further discuss this.
Can you pull it from the block vote?
For next week's call, I'll propose to use Hour 2 to discuss non-block-voted issues from SMART App Launch (FYI @Bas van den Heuvel, as discussed just now at the tail-end of our bulk data discussion!)
I would like to pull FHIR-32597 out of block vote. I added a comment to improve the resolution
I think we had that covered in a separate issue (FHIR-32597 was specifically about the diagram), but will remove this from the block vote and update its disposition per your request.
